text: Sonotoki arra wa, 1-ba no dai karasu o noko wa shite ji o hora se, sono ototo no shitai o, ikaga ni oubeki ka o kare ni shimesa reta. Kare wa itta. `A nasakenai kyodai no shitai o homuru no ni, watashi wa kono karasu hodo no koto sae dekinai no ka.' Koshite kare wa kokai suru mono no 1-ri to natta
